001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion.HexUtil;
007
008/**
009 *
010 */
011public class SignedRawTransaction {
012    private final byte[] bytes;
013    private final boolean complete;
014
015    public static SignedRawTransaction of(Transaction transaction) {
016        return new SignedRawTransaction(transaction.bitcoinSerialize(), true);
017    }
018
019    @JsonCreator
020    public SignedRawTransaction(@JsonProperty("hex")        String   hex,
021                                @JsonProperty("complete")   boolean  complete) {
022        this(HexUtil.hexStringToByteArray(hex), complete);
023    }
024
025    private SignedRawTransaction(byte[] bytes, boolean complete) {
026        this.bytes = bytes;
027        this.complete = complete;
028    }
029
030    public  String getHex() {
031        return HexUtil.bytesToHexString(bytes);
032    }
033
034    public boolean isComplete() {
035        return complete;
036    }
037}
